name: Blacksmith's Island
description:
You are a general store manager in a fantasy time. You are tasked to create weapons and metal bars for your business, but are puny and cannot fetch the raw materials yourself. Create quests to risk-taking adventurers to do the tasks for you, focus on balancing prices, inventory and honing your management skills for better profit in this business simulation game.
